alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby County through 1115 AM CDT... At 1044 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Panama, or 6 miles northwest of Harlan, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlan, Earling, Panama, Westphalia, Kirkman and Nishna Bend Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
